1370: Breghlent moved to St. Ians straet.B.7 after marriage.
Got married to Mourin at age 24 in 1370.
Gave birth to Saxiardis in 1370 at age 24.
1372: Gave birth to Bodekine in 1372 at age 26.
1374: Gave birth to Flore in 1374 at age 28.
1377: Gave birth to Ryccie in 1377 at age 31.
1379: Gave birth to Lelien in 1379 at age 33.
Lost daughter Flore when Flore was 6 years old.
1380: Gave birth to Arnoud in 1380 at age 34.
1384: Gave birth to Folqui in 1384 at age 38.
Lost daughter Lelien when Lelien was 6 years old.
1386: Lost son Arnoud when Arnoud was 7 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1387: Lost daughter Saxiardis when Saxiardis was 18 years old.
Lost daughter Ryccie when Ryccie was 11 years old.
